elements.name: graphql from a file and variables

doc_string.value:

1 > Host: 127.0.0.1:51918
1 > User-Agent: Apache-HttpClient/4.5.5 (Java/1.8.0_181)
{"query":"query PokemonAndAttacks($name: String) {\n  pokemon(name: $name) {\n    id\n    number\n    name\n    attacks {\n      special {\n        name\n        type\n        damage\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n","variables":{"name":"Charmander"}}

{"data":{"pokemon":{"id":"UG9rZW1vbjowMDQ=","number":"004","name":"Charmander","attacks":{"special":[{"name":"Flame Burst","type":"Fire","damage":30},{"name":"Flame Charge","type":"Fire","damage":25},{"name":"Flamethrower","type":"Fire","damage":55}]}}}}

steps.name: def expected = [{ name: 'Flamethrower', type: 'Fire', damage: 55 }, { name: 'Flame Charge', type: 'Fire', damage: 25 }]
match $.data.pokemon contains { number: '004', name: 'Charmander', attacks: { special: '#(^expected)' } }
